name: athena-express-ng
description: AthenaExpressNG makes it easier to execute SQL queries on Amazon Athena by consolidating & astracting several methods in the AWS SDK V3

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Manuel Tarouca <manuel+git@matm.xyz
